name: Papanasam
bio: Suyambulingam, an uneducated but hardworking and self-made cable operator, leads a peaceful life in the town of Papanasam with his wife and two daughters. When an unexpected turn of events leads to an accidental murder, he throws himself into the quagmire to save his family from the impending nightmare. How he fares in his ingenious attempts to extract his family out of the soup is what forms the crux of this thriller. —PipingHotViews
